Welcome to the 4WARD Pool

Single Operator Cardano Pool that donates 50% of it's income to the Third Option Foundation to help those who've quietly served

4WARD Pool

The 4WARD pool (ticker '4WARD') is a Single Operator Cardano Pool operated through a small business located in the US. The pool was created as a way to give back to those who have quietly served by donating fifty percent of the pool rewards to the Third Option Foundation.

The 4WARD pool consists of one block producer with two relay nodes deployed to AWS. Each AWS instance is using 4 CPUs and 16 GB RAM, which exceeds the current hardware requirements. One relay and the block producer are in the AWS US East Region and the other relay is in the AWS European Central Region.

Security and recovery best practices were put in place to help guarantee server availability. Grafana is used to remotely monitor the status of all three servers. Should disaster recovery be needed, secure remote access is available to our admins from anywhere in the world.

You can check the current pool status at Pool Vet.

Third Option Foundation

The Third Option Foundation seeks to heal, help, and honor members of the CIA's Special Operations community and their families.

It was founded to fill the gap created by the fact that members of the CIA's Special Operations community function in a covert manner. Their covert nature leaves them ineligible for most charitable assistance available to those who have served in other ways.

The Third Option Foundation offers assistance to children, spouses, parents, and siblings of fallen and injured warriors. The assistance can be in the form of financial and logistical support, academic and college prep for children, home maintenance, counseling and family services, physical health and wellness support, legacy activities to honor fallen warriors, and the establishment of memorials.

To learn more about their mission, please visit their website.

Your ADA delegation to the 4WARD pool is needed to help support this worthy cause.
